title: Add 6 new uploaded photos to the proposal grid (same layout) and remove local upload UI/state

requirements.text: Add the 6 newly uploaded images as static frontend assets and ensure they are included in the build output with these exact filenames: IMG-20260208-WA0008-1.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0010-1.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0005-5.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0008-2.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0010-2.jpg, IMG-20260208-WA0005-6.jpg.
acceptanceCriteria: All 6 image files exist in the frontend static/public assets and are referenced by exact filename (case-sensitive).
A production build includes the 6 images (no missing asset 404s for these filenames).

requirements.text: Keep the existing proposal page layout and interactions intact, but update the photo grid under the main /saesha.jpg image to display all 6 newly uploaded images as the smaller tiles (same grid style/spacing/rounded corners). Use a 2-column grid with 3 rows of small tiles under the main image (main image still spans both columns).
acceptanceCriteria: The main /saesha.jpg image remains at the top of the card spanning both columns.
Exactly 6 smaller photo tiles render under the main image in a 2-column grid (3 rows), using the 6 new uploaded static assets.
YES/NO buttons behavior and the YES success screen remain unchanged.

requirements.text: Remove the in-page local photo upload functionality and its UI/state from the proposal page now that the grid is fully static: remove the hidden <input type="file"> element, the "Add photos/Replace photos" button, the clear button, and any related local preview state usage in frontend/src/App.tsx. If the local preview hook is no longer used anywhere, remove its import/usage and clean up any now-unused code.
acceptanceCriteria: No upload/replace/clear photo controls are visible in the UI.
frontend/src/App.tsx no longer imports or uses useLocalPhotoTilePreviews, useRef for file input, lucide-react Upload/X icons, or any handlers solely for local photo uploads.
The app compiles with no unused imports/variables related to local photo upload.

requirements.text: Preserve graceful fallback behavior for missing images: if any of the static photo assets (including /saesha.jpg) fail to load, render a visually consistent pink-themed placeholder tile that does not break the grid layout.
acceptanceCriteria: If a small-tile image fails to load, that tile shows a placeholder with the same sizing/rounded corners as an image tile.
If /saesha.jpg fails to load, the existing main-image placeholder behavior remains in place.
No broken layout or console errors caused by image load failures (beyond standard 404s when simulating missing assets).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain single-actor; all Motoko logic stays in backend/main.mo (no new backend services).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change the proposal copy, button labels, or the YES/NO interaction logic beyond what is required to remove the photo upload UI.
No backend storage or image upload persistence is needed.
No additional pages or routing changes.
